General.Name: Maha Properti Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Maha Properti Indonesia Tbk engages in the real estate development business in Indonesia. It develops apartments, townhouses, offices, and shophouses. The company was formerly known as PT Propertindo Mulia Investama Tbk. PT Maha Properti Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Mayapada Tower 2 Building, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12920
